query:
UPDATE email_trigger 
                SET 
                    script_path = $1,
                    path = $2,
                    is_flow = $3,
                    local_part = $4,
                    workspaced_local_part = $5,
                    edited_by = $6,
                    email = $7,
                    edited_at = now(),
                    error_handler_path = $8,
                    error_handler_args = $9,
                    retry = $10,
                    mode = $11
                WHERE 
                    workspace_id = $12 AND path = $13
